product_details.name: ALGAZIME Bio-Organic Root Activator - Revolutionary Plant Growth Booster
product_details.description:
• 100% Bio-Organic Granules for Safe and Natural Plant Growth
• Advanced Root Activation Technology for Stronger Plant Development
• Premium Quality Growth Promoter for Regenerative Agriculture
• Enhanced Nutrient Uptake for Healthier Plants
• Eco-Friendly Formula by AGROCIL - Trusted Agricultural Solutions
• Promotes Sustainable and Pure Farming Practices
• Professional-Grade Agricultural Product for Maximum Results
• Suitable for All Types of Crops and Plants

banner_details:
The banner features a clean, eco-conscious aesthetic with a soft dual-green gradient background that evokes freshness and organic values. A central circular gradient creates a soft focus area framing the product image layer (“product_image”), which presents a packaged product prominently. The headline (“heading”) uses a bold font in dark green to draw attention at the top. Just below it, the subheadline (“subheading”) clearly states the product's benefits in an earthy olive green tone. A vibrant call-to-action button (“cta_background” and “cta”) is placed at the bottom center, enhancing usability. An “ECO FRIENDLY” badge (“badge”) in a dark green circle reinforces ecological value. The design is balanced with a footer tagline (“tagline”) emphasizing sustainability.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Mint (#E8F5E9)
- Light Spring Green (#C8E6C9)
- Dark Olive Green (#33691E)
- Forest Green (#558B2F)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a clean, professional palette that blends nature and reliability. Dominant colors include deep navy blue (#1C2634) for the borders and text ribbons, embodying trust and expertise. A crisp white background (#FFFFFF) highlights the branding and artwork, creating contrast and clarity. The tree graphic uses earthy brown (#774936) for the trunk and branches, and fresh green (#A3C644) for the leaves, symbolizing organic growth and vitality. These tones are well-balanced—the white space elevates the darker hues, while the green subtly pops against the brown, emphasizing natural health. Use these colors to create an advertisement that’s rooted in purity and agricultural strength.
